messages.title: you can make the difference
messages.content: Britain needs change. You will soon have the chance to make that change happen.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We have bold plans to change our country for the better and get the economy moving.
Our plans won't cost money but will need real energy - like our determination to improve school discipline.
We found the money from other areas like cutting government waste.

issues.economy: Need a new government with the energy, leadership and values to get the country moving and our economy back on track.
issues.governance: Stopping Labour's jobs tax, cutting government waste.

leaflet.personalStatement: I hope you'll take the chance to vote for that change.

images.caption: David Cameron working at his desk.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet urges voters to consider the changes the Conservative Party offers under David Cameron's leadership and highlights the need for change.
